com.weilpublishing
Class CVSWrapper

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.weilpublishing.CVSWrapper
public class CVSWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

In order to avoid passing along the password, one can copy the SSH key: scp identity.pub michi@cvs-extra.wyona.com:.ssh/authorized_keys By using java.lang.Process.getOutputStream one could probably pass the password into the process (also see http://forum.java.sun.com/thread.jsp?forum=32&thread=60161&message=153079)

Author:
Michael Wechner
